ComicInfo.Summary:
A Strange Way to Die: A man is led to his death by the ghost of the girl he killed in a car accident.
The Mouse of History: A mouse escapes from a cage in research assistant Paul Jonas's lab, and leads him to a magic book that can alter the future. He uses the book to his advantage, but the mouse inadvertently causes his death by chewing parts of the pages away, which changes the words written in the book.
The Lovely Little Lady with the Sea-Green Tail!: A marine biologist finds a mermaid and keeps her captive, but when he tries to lure her mate to add to the exhibit he is eaten by the creature that emerges from the sea.
